Entries.companionAccepted: Sure, I'd love to,$h#$b#I think it'll be a great way to explore.$l
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: You're going to take me exploring today?$l#$b#Yay! I'm so happy langga!<$8
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Of course, I'll go with you langga.#$b#Where are we going today?$h#$b#I miss roaming around with you, you know.$l
Entries.companionRejected: I'm sorry, I still have a lot to do in the Amethyne kitchen.
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: Aww, I can't today my langga.$s#$b#The Madame has me cooking for an important client she's having.#$b#I still have tons of work to do.$u
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: I'm awfully sorry langga.$s#$b#But I have to skip this one.$s#$b#I have to plan out the menu for the upcoming event.
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Oh I'm afraid not. I have to wake up early tomorrow.#$b#Maybe next time, @.
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: It's already late langga, I have to rest.#$b#I'll see you tomorrow
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Langga, i need to rest for tomorrow.$s#$b#I'm sorry, I'll make it up to you okay?#$b#I'll cook for you, your favorite dessert.$8
Entries.companionDismiss: I had fun, @.#$b#I learned a lot about new things today thanks to you.$h
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: I'm happy I got to spend time with you, langga.$h#$b#I'll see you tomorrow?#$b#I'll miss you white you're gone.$l
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: Ah, that was a great break from all the work that's been on my mind.$h#$b#Thank you for spending time with me, langga.$8#$b#I'll see you at home?$h
Entries.companionDismissAuto: Oh no, it's getting late.$u#$b#I must get some rest. I have an early day tomorrow.
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: It's getting a bit late, langga.#$b#I'll go ahead, okay?#$b#I'll see you tomorrow.$h
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Langga, it's quite late already.#$b#Shouldn't we get some rest?#$b#I think I should head home. I still have to fix some stuff.#$b#I'll wait up for you okay?$8
Entries.companionRecruited: Okay, so what are we going to do today?#$b#I'm so excited to explore the town and the village.$8#$b#I don't get much time to enjoy everything outside apart from my occasional stroll to look for stuff.$u
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: Where are you taking me, langga?$h#$b#Tee hee, I'm glad that I get to roam around with you!$8
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: You really miss me that much, langga?$h#$b#I'm so happy to get to see you and stroll with you, again.$8
Entries.giveForages: This, when used or cooked properly can be something delectable.$h#$b#Here, why don't you try using this?
Entries.farmerRunAway_Dating: Langga, please slow down.$u#$b#I'm getting kind of out of breath.$s
Entries.giveForages_Dating: Try using this next time, langga.#$b#I know you could find something innovative for this, you're my little imaginative star.$8
Entries.farmerRunAway_Spouse: Nako, langga!$a#$b#Please don't run so fast, I'm getting tired and you may trip.$s
Entries.companion_Farm: Ooh, your place looks nice#$b#I've always been curious about how people tend to their gardens.
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Wow, your farm is really shaping up huh?#$b#You know, Master Louie knows a lot about plants.#$b#That kid is very smart beneath his not-so-humble ways.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: The smell of rain on the ground's kind of...#$b#I don't know... It makes me feel like I wanna run and dance around it.$8
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: The snow reminds me of a dessert back in my hometown.#$b#It consists of ice shards, coconut, flan, and ube ice cream.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: Colors of spring are fun to put on dishes, you know?#$b#It makes a plate look really happy.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: What do you do when it gets too hot here over the summer, @?#$b#What refreshers are you fond of?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: What is our favorite memory of fall, @?
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: I'm curious, @.#$b#What's your favorite warm comfort food?
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: Your farm's really shaping up, langga.#$b#What's your secret to growing crops?
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: I like it when we go to your farm langga.#$b#It feels so peaceful here.
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: Why don't we dance under the rain, langga?$l#$b#Wouldn't that be so cute?$8
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: Hmm, I wonder what will happen if we both stand here hand in hand and wait for the snow to drop.$h#$b#It'll look like we have snow dresses
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Dating: Langga, can we pick some flowers?#$b#We could make them into flower crowns and the rest we could use it for cooking.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Dating: Hey, you're sweating so much.#$b#Come on, let's go find something refreshing to drink, my langga
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: The leaves look like cake decorations.$h#$b#Haha, I don't know why food is on my mind right now, it's funny.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: Brr, it's quite cold langga.#$b#Can I ask for a hug?$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: Did you know that when I was younger, I wanted to have a farm of my own?$h#$b#I don't really know why, haha. It's just that it appealed to me so much growing my own ingredients.$l#$b#But honestly, I feel bad slaughtering my own animals.$s
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: It's kind of crazy how time flies by right?$h#$b#I remember wanting to explore, and right now, I feel like I know a lot around already.$8
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: I don't know why dancing under the rain appeals so much to me.$8#$b#I'm really glad that you entertain my childish wants.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Come and give me a hug here, langga.#$b#Your hug and maybe some of my special hot cocoa is all I nead during this snowy day.$8
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: It's so nice how you take care of the crops, langga.$h#$b#I like being able to use fresh hand-picked ingredients when I cook for us.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: Langga, what if we grab a picnic basket and take a dip over at the ridge.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: One of the best things about fall is making fall cookies.$h#$b#What if we go inside and make some, langga?#$b#We could take them to the village and share it with the kids.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: What if we hold a small celebration here in the farm, langga?#$b#The ‘winter' season in my home is a time for gathering and oneness.#$b#Maybe we could do that here too as a family.$8
Entries.companion_Town: The saloon has many great dishes.#$b#I gush about Mr. Gus and Mr. Pika's work so much.$l#$b#They're such inspirations to me.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: You know, the Log Cabin Hotel also has varieties of food.#$b#You just have to know what to pick.$h#$b#Mr. Richard is always welcoming to guests.
The Amethyne mansion is one of the oldest structures here in the village.#$b#There is so much to explore here, you know?
